title: What will be the next age after the digital era? - Quora

response.answer_text: In present era, we call it “digital world”, digital data is stored in binary “0 and 1”. Disk drives and optical drives store data in binary form. Now the world is changing and Engineers from University of Washington says that in future data will be stored in DNA molecule which is completely different from binary storage.  10,000 gigabytes can be stored in the faint pink smear of DNA at the end of the test tube. Here the link describes more details. Dna based storage system

What will most affect the future of humanity according to E. Musk: The internet; sustainable energy; space exploration, in particular the permanent extension of life beyond Earth; artificial intelligence; and reprogramming the human genetic code.
